goal.tools.mc.program.goal.trans

Class TauClass<T extends Term,A extends Atom,U extends Update>

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.tools.mc.program.goal.trans.TauClass<T,A,U>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - - The type of term associated with the KRT that the agent to which this transition class belongs uses.
    A - - The type of atom associated with the KRT that the agent to which this transition class belongs uses.
    U - - The type of update associated with the KRT that the agent to which this transition class belongs uses.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PrologTauClass

    public abstract class TauClass<T extends Term,A extends Atom,U extends Update>
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a transition class.
    Author:
    sungshik

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ActionCombo combo
      The action combo that is the consequent of the action rule corresponding to this transition class.
      protected TauModule<T,A,U> tauModule
      The transition module to which this transition class belongs.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TauClass(TauModule<T,A,U> tauModule, Rule rule)
      Constructs a transition class belonging to the specified transition module, and corresponding to the specified rule.

      • hide

        public void hide()
        Hides this transition class from the transition module such that it is no long considered for execution. This is typically used with slicing.
